reviews.review_msg:
PLAN 100 fall 2022 
DO WELL ON THE ASSIGNMENTS. 
I went to maybe two lectures the whole sem and got a 87. 
tough grader on the assignments to make up for the fact that the lectures are super chill and fun, and I think we only did 3 assignments in total.  also did not take a single note in the lectures.

The sweetest prof ever, she is so nice and brings students candy! Lots of guest lectures, lecture content had a confusing structure and she was sort of frazzled but the lack of tests and exams made this manageable. She even cancelled our final paper. Assignments were marked hard so do well on those and participate in class for a grade booster:)

Dr. T is a super passionate prof who really takes time to make sure all of her lectures are informative and easy to understand. She loves to give out bonus marks for assignments if you participate and ask questions so make sure you do !

Tammara is one of the best professors I have ever had! She somehow made an asynchronous class engaging and her assignments were actually fun to do! Whenever I had a question, she responded very quickly and I would recommend her to anybody!
